Name: Genesis
Ingredients: 10 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice). *Special ingredient #1 : All spice & lemon grass syrup
Review: A spiced apricot daiquiri. Lemongrass is the stand-out ingredient that makes this cocktail interesting.
History: Polish Bacardí Legacy 2016 winning cocktail by Paweł Rodaszyński, El Koktel, Warsaw. Paweł says, " Don Facundo did not know that the beginning of his work would become a legacy. The light, universal taste of Bacardí rum is known all over the world. We each stand every day before the same opportunity as Facundo - a chance to build our own legacy. In order to achieve it, you need flavours that can inspire. Bacardí Carta Oro, with its vanilla notes, is a perfect match for apricot, lemongrass, lime, and allspice. Create your own legacy! "
Nutrition: One serving of Genesis contains 109 calories
